# MJB Electrical Services
> Electricians in Halesowen, West Midlands

## About
Local Halesowen electricians with 300+ five-star reviews. Handle everything from extractor fan installations to full rewires across the West Midlands. Known for clear communication, fair pricing, and leaving every job spotless. Available 24/7 for emergency callouts with specialist fault-finding expertise.

## Contact
- Phone: 07941 746878
- Address: 47 Drews Holloway, Belle Vale, Halesowen, B63 2AG
- Area: Halesowen and the wider West Midlands
- Website listed on [TradeHub](https://tradehub.directory/trades/mjb-electrical-services)

## Services
- Full Rewiring
- Consumer Unit Upgrades
- Extractor Fan Installation
- LED Lighting Upgrades
- Fault Finding & Rectification
- Socket & Switch Installation
- Electrical Testing (EICR)
- PAT Testing
- Cooker & Oven Connections
- Emergency Callouts (24/7)

## Areas Covered
Halesowen, Birmingham, Dudley, Stourbridge, Oldbury, Blackheath, Quinton, Bartley Green, Cradley Heath, Smethwick, Solihull
